songs.title: Bounce Back (M-22 Remix)
songs.lyrics:
[Intro: All]
Steady, are you ready?
Are you ready? Are you ready?
Steady, are you ready?
Are you ready? Are you ready?
Steady, are you ready?
Are you ready? Are you ready?
Steady, are you ready?
Are you ready? Are you ready?
Steady, are you ready?
Are you ready? Are you ready?
Steady, are you ready?
Are you ready? Are you ready?
Steady, are you ready?
Are you ready? Are you ready?
Steady, are you ready?
Are you ready? Are you ready?

[Chorus: All]
However do you want me?
However do you need me?
However do you want me?
However do you need me?
However do you want me?
However do you need me?
However do you want me?
However do you need me?
However do you want me?
However do you need me?
However do you want me?
However do you need me?
However do you want me?
However do you need me?
However do you want me?
However do you need me?
However do you want me?

[Break: All]
Steady, are you ready?
Are you ready? Are you ready?
Steady, are you ready?
Are you ready? Are you ready?
Steady, are you ready?
Are you ready? Are you ready?
Steady, are you ready?
Are you ready? Are you ready?

[Chorus: All]
However do you want me?
However do you need me?
However do you want me?
However do you need me?
However do you want me?
However do you need me?
However do you want me?
However do you need me?
However do you want me?
However do you need me?
However do you want me?
However do you need me?
However do you want me?
However do you need me?
However do you want me?
However do you need me?

[Outro: All]
However do you want me?
However do you need me?
However do you want me?
However do you need me?
However do you want me?
However do you need me?
However do you want me?
However do you need me?
